Description: As a Reception and Administration Assistant, you will be the first point of contact for our company, providing essential administrative support to ensure smooth daily operations. Your role will encompass a blend of receptionist and administrative duties, making you a crucial part of our team.Key Responsibilities:1. Front Desk Management: Greet visitors, answer phone calls, and direct inquiries to the appropriate department or individual.2. Visitor Assistance: Ensure a welcoming and professional environment for guests and provide assistance as needed.3. Mail and Packages: Receive, sort, and distribute incoming mail and packages.4. Appointment Scheduling: Coordinate and schedule appointments, meetings, and conference rooms as required.5. Maintain Reception Area: Keep the reception area organized, clean, and well-stocked with necessary supplies.6. Visitor Records: Maintain a visitor log and ensure security procedures are followed for visitor access.7. Data Entry: Assist with data entry tasks, maintaining accurate records and databases.8. Document Handling: Organize and file documents, both physical and electronic, ensuring accessibility and confidentiality.9. Correspondence: Draft and distribute internal and external communications, emails, and memos.10. Office Supplies: Monitor and restock office supplies as needed.11. Travel Arrangements: Assist in making travel arrangements for employees when required.12. Meeting Support: Prepare meeting materials, agendas, and take minutes as requested.13. Record Keeping: Assist with record-keeping, including employee attendance and leave requests.14. General Administrative Support: Provide support to various departments and managers as needed.Skills
Skills: High school diploma or equivalent; relevant college education is a plus.
• Previous experience in a receptionist or administrative assistant role is preferred.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
• Strong organizational abilities and attention to detail.
• Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
